title: Guernsey: Voices of the Occupation
itunes:title: Guernsey: Voices of the Occupation
itunes:subtitle: This year marks the 75th anniversary of the liberation of the Channel Islands. Dan went to meet four people who remember the war years on the islands and hear their experiences of occupation.
description:
This year marks the 75th anniversary of the liberation of the Channel Islands. Dan went to meet four people who remember the war years on the islands and hear their experiences of occupation.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
